title: KO Cannon
summaries: The KO Cannon is a Hardmode melee weapon obtained during a Blood Moon. It autofires a boxing glove projectile that is connected to the weapon's base by a short, thick chain. After striking a target or traveling 17 tiles, the glove retracts back into the weapon before being ready to fire again.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the KO Cannon has a 1/5 (20%) chance to be dropped by Clowns. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it has a 1/1000 (0.1%) chance to be dropped by any enemy during a Hardmode Blood Moon.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 40 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 35 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
